snippet.title: Who Am I: Remedy Teaser Trailer | New Psychological Horror 2024 | Made in Unreal Engine 5
snippet.description:
Who Am I: Remedy Teaser Trailer | New Psychological Horror 2023 | Unreal Engine 5

Steamstore link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2721420/Who_am_I_Remedy/

This trailer shows the actual gameplay. Some elements can be different in the release version.

Scheduled release date January 2024

You're panting, your heart pounding at breakneck speed, adrenaline in your blood, aren't you... Afraid? Waking up with no memories and no purpose, lost in your own head, what will you choose - to learn the truth about yourself or to remain in ignorance? Does it matter who you are, man or woman, adult or child? Find out who you are, what this place is and what happened there. Become a detective, putting together the puzzle of the past history, become the one who will shed light on the shadow...

Fuetures:
-Orginal sountrack brimming with atmospere and personality
-Puzzles
-Gameplay mechanics for full immersion
-Notes revealing the personalities of all the characters
-Deep and soulful story
-Write your investigation together
-Always ringing phone, is anybody there?
-Who is your friend?
-Who is your enemy?


Developer's Note:
Who I am: Remedy is a game in the horror-detective genre. Creating this project, I was inspired by a lot of horror games, studied the pros and cons and decided to build that atmosphere, a game that would play with the player himself, crush, mock and be unpredictable. I made a soundtrack that fully captures the atmosphere of every moment. I just want to put a piece of my soul into this game. The game will ask you questions and give you answers - your job is to see, hear and understand them. Are you connected to the story or are you just an observer?

#horrorgaming #relistic #unrealengine5 #horrorstories #gameplay
